job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-09-02T06:11:19.000Z", "description": "

Description

Arzeda is a world-leader in protein design and synthetic biology. Leveraging our core expertise in structure-based computational protein design, machine learning and high-throughput testing, we design novel proteins and bio-catalytic processes for the sustainable production of performance ingredients and materials. A deep tech, mission-driven company, we are passionate about our mission to design novel proteins and products that enhance our lives and protect our planet.

 

Arzeda is searching for a talented software engineer to help build the largest and most comprehensive set of enzyme & protein engineering data the world has seen. This is an opportunity to solve a rich and diverse set of problems crucial to the execution and tracking of the high-throughput laboratory experiments necessary to generate that dataset. You will work with a multi-disciplinary team and play a leading role in crafting the breadth of software tools necessary to enable streamlined workflows across all experimental activities at Arzeda, including genetic design, assay development & testing, analytical chemistry, and strain engineering.

 

The preferred work location for this position is Seattle, Washington. However, remote work from other U.S. locations is a possibility. The position comes with a competitive salary and benefits, including health insurance, dental insurance, and paid time off, commensurate with applicant qualifications.

 

Responsibilities

  • Developing software tools, workflows, and user interfaces for scientists executing high-throughput laboratory experiments, such as NGS and high-throughput enzyme assays.
  • Developing extensions for our LIMS and interfacing services to the LIMS.
  • Developing registries and databases of biological materials such as DNA and organisms.
  • Collaborating with scientists to produce actionable software specifications and requirements.
  • Communicating software engineering objectives, approaches, and outcomes to internal stakeholders.
  • Mentoring fellow software engineers.

 

Qualifications

  • Fluency in Java and/or Python.
  • Software development experience, including modern software practices such as version control and automated testing.
  • Experience developing bioinformatics or laboratory workflows, and/or biological databases.


Inquiries and Applications

Please apply here on LinkedIn or send your CV and a cover letter to jobs[at]arzeda.com with the subject line \u201cSoftware Engineer - Informatics\u201d.


Arzeda Corp. (www.arzeda.com) is an equal opportunity employer promoting diversity and inclusion in the workspace.
